name: Plug (Pillonel Matthis)
description:
Alice, Bob, and Laura have a lot on their plates, but they live together in a home with only six power outlets.
In Plug, you try and satisfy them all by giving them power when they need it!

How to play

  • Use the tasklist of your phone to check what the flatmates need to do, each person has a tab ;
  • Plug and unplug their appliances at the right time so they can reach their goals ;
  • Deal with the unexpected events ;
  • Make sure your phone never runs out of battery!
